channel.title: Rongping Zhu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Rongping Zhu's Blog

item.title: Notes on Hugo Blog
item.description: Quick Start hugo new site <site-name> # new site git init; git submodule add <url> themes/theme-name # add a theme from remote hugo new <CAT>/<FILE>.<FORMAT> # new article, mainly .md hugo server -D # local server hugo -D # build in ./public/, 'D' for deploy Drafts do not get deployed; once you finish a post, update the header of the post to say draft: false. Notes for submodule My blog uses the theme Mainroad, and I added some additional features, for example, tap-to-top, word count, archive, etc.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Do not have an About now.
